g.text: createCourse(_institutionAddress: address, _courseName: string, _createdAt: uint256, learnerAddress: address[]) <<checkInstructorCourseAccess>>

setTokenMetadata(_courseId: uint256, _institutionId: uint256, _instructorId: uint256, _fieldOfKnowledge: string, _skillName: string, _institutionAddress: address, createdAt: uint256) <<onlyInstructor, checkInstructorCourseAccess>>
addLearnerToCourse(_courseId: uint256, learnerAddress: address, _institutionAddress: address) <<onlyInstructor, checkInstructorCourseAccess>>
transferHelpingToken(from: address, to: address, id: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256)
transferInstructorScoringToken(from: address, to: address, id: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256)
<<event>> Approval(owner: address, spender: address, tokenId: uint256, value: uint256)
<<event>> InstitutionRegistered(institutionId: uint256, institutionName: string, registeredTime: uint)
<<event>> InstructorRegistered(instructorId: uint256, instructorName: string, registeredTime: uint256)
<<event>> InstructorRegisteredUnderInstitution(instructorId: uint256, instructorName: string, institutionId: uint256, institutionName: string, registeredTime: uint256)
<<event>> LearnerRegistered(learnerId: uint256, learnerName: string, registeredTime: uint256)
<<event>> CourseCreated(courseId: uint256, instructorId: uint256, institutionId: uint256, courseName: string)
<<event>> LearnerRegisteredForCourse(courseId: uint256, instructorId: uint256, institutionId: uint256, courseName: string)
<<event>> AttendanceTokenMinted(holderAddress: address, tokenId: uint256, courseId: uint256, amount: uint256)
<<event>> TokenMetadataCreated(courseId: uint256, courseTokenId: uint256, institutionId: uint256, instructorId: uint256, skillName: string, _fieldOfKnowledge: string, registeredTime: uint256)
<<event>> HelpingTokenTransfered(from: address, to: address, tokenId: uint256, amount: uint256, courseId: uint256)
<<event>> ScoreTokenMinted(holderAddress: address, tokenId: uint256, courseId: uint256, amount: uint256, fieldOfKnowledge: string, skillName: string)
<<event>> HelpingTokenMinted(holderAddress: address, tokenId: uint256, courseId: uint256, amount: uint256)
<<event>> InstructorScoringTokenTransfered(from: address, to: address, tokenId: uint256, amount: uint256, courseId: uint256)
safeTransferFrom(from: address, to: address, id: uint256, amount: uint256, data: bytes)
safeBatchTransferFrom(from: address, to: address, id: uint256[], amount: uint256[], data: bytes)
mintAttendanceToken(_learnerId: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
batchMintAttendanceToken(_learnerIds: uint256[], amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256) <<isLearnerWithinCourse, checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
getInstructorDetails(institutionAddress: address, instructorAddress: address): (_institutionId: uint256, _instructorId: uint256, _instructorName: string, isActive: bool, createdAt: uint256)
mintScoreToken(_learnerId: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256, _fieldOfKnowledge: string, _skillName: string) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
batchMintScoreToken(_learnerIds: uint256[], amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256, _fieldOfKnowledge: string, _skillName: string) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
mintHelpingToken(_learnerId: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
batchMintHelpingToken(_learnerIds: uint256[], amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
mintInstructorScoreToken(_learnerId: uint256, amount: uint256, _courseId: uint256, _createdAt: uint256) <<checkTokenTransferIsAllowed>>
